name: G.B.
description:
GIANT ROM 2 - G.B. - WHAT HIDEO KOJIMA DOES NEXT

(it was this or air force gator again??)

They may have left their office, but something stayed behind...

WASD to move, Click to Zoom, E for Flashlight

jury-rigged it to make it more of a "game" but it got super sloppy during the end. getting the audio small enough to import was a pain but it all worked out (i think)

wish i could've done more and polished it more but frankly i'm glad i was able to throw together what i did in between work this week

now i just want to make more games now

available for download because the web player was acting like it wanted to crash
